text: 1:15 Matyu 15:11; Luk 11:39-41; Rom 14:14; 14:20; 14:23; 1 Korin 6:12Godɨn damazimɨn zuezir gumazamiziba, me ghaze, dagheba ko biziba uaghan zue, eghtɨ me da iniam. Ezɨ gumazamizir Godɨn damazimɨn arazir kurabagh amua, nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn itir puvatɨziba, men bizitam zueghan kogham. Men nɨghnɨziba ko naviba Godɨn damazimɨn bar mɨze. Egha me uan araziba deravɨra da tuisɨgha arazir aghuibar gɨn mangan aghua.
